name: Vigaro Runner
description:
Story:



Player character is red/blue colored pill and his mission in this platformer/runner game is to find star which is located end of levels. 16 Different maps. Levels contain moving objects, rotating objects, disappearing platforms.. Also lot of traps which kill player. Traps like moving saws, axes, spinning wheels etc. If player hits traps or wall to water, he will die and need restart level from start. So be the hero pill and use your jumping skills to finish 16 levels

Features:

- 16 maps
- Deathly traps like moving saws, axes etc
- Falling to water will kill player
- Different platforms, like rotating, disappearing and moving platforms

Controls:


Jump= Space Bar
Dash= Q
